source.author: Luke Winkie
source.title: How Hallmark is handling pandemic Valentine’s Day

exampleSentences.sentence: The pandemic-specific cards came up quickly afterwards, because we heard people saying, “Gosh, birthdays aren’t what they used to be.”

source.author: Judith Martin, Nicholas Martin, Jacobina Martin
source.title: Miss Manners: She’s ‘best’ at giving gifts but stinks at receiving them

exampleSentences.sentence: For a milestone birthday, she bought herself a designer purse, a matching wallet and some brand-name apparel.

source.author: Kayleigh Barber
source.title: ‘A retail media company’: How CAMP wants its online content to eventually drive customers back to stores

exampleSentences.sentence: Because of this success, CAMP will create new online shopping experiences for birthday parties, baby showers and holidays like Valentine’s Day.

source.author: By Dan Q. Dao/Saveur
source.title: Keep dry January going all year with these cutting-edge non-alcoholic cocktails

exampleSentences.sentence: Like their liquor-based counterparts, booze-free drinks can serve to help us discover new flavors or celebrate a special occasion like an anniversary, a birthday, or a new job—or just making it through the work week at your current one.

source.author: Shelly Fan
source.title: This Is Where Empathy Lives in the Brain, and How It Works

exampleSentences.sentence: It’s what lets you guess why your friend is upset on her birthday.

source.author: Carolyn Hax
source.title: Carolyn Hax: They ‘really cannot stand’ their rambunctious grandchild

exampleSentences.sentence: All we want are two-minute videos and still photos, and to send checks for birthdays and Christmas.

source.author: Laurie McGinley, Lenny Bernstein
source.title: Many who have received the coronavirus vaccine wonder: What can I safely do?

exampleSentences.sentence: Many are being conservative — birthday parties in crowded bars are not on their agendas — and using their new status to help others who remain unprotected, including adult children who previously had been anxious about their parents’ vulnerability.

source.author: Kyle Melnick
source.title: A sick mother, a loving son, a signed Ovechkin jersey — and how the Caps tried to help

exampleSentences.sentence: After receiving a game-worn Washington Capitals jersey for his birthday in 2014, Nicholas Gross placed it in the front of his closet.

source.author: Carolyn Hax
source.title: Carolyn Hax: Hesitant to plunge into the online dating pool

exampleSentences.sentence: I believed this was for birthdays, Christmas and occasional gifts.

source.author: Walter Isaacson
source.title: mRNA Technology Gave Us the First COVID-19 Vaccines. It Could Also Upend the Drug Industry

exampleSentences.sentence: In January 2020, Afeyan took one of his daughters to a restaurant near his office in Cambridge to celebrate her birthday.
